name: Pinky's Climb
description:
Created by:

Greg Belasco - Game Design/Narrative Design/Production Lead

Michelle Foisy - Art

Ron Bozikis, II - Programming

Built with Unity Engine

You play as “Pinky”, minding your own business as you gaze out to the land atop the mountain, your rival “Spike” steals your diary and pushes you down the mountain. You must collect the pages of your diary to help throughout the game and climb back up to the top of the mountain. Despite this negative experience, Pinky still finds ways to stay optimistic during his climb.
